Carlex is a global automotive glass manufacturer that produces windshields, sidelites, backlites, and sunroofs for a variety of automakers. Some of Carlex's major customers in the automotive industry include General Motors, Ford, and FCA (Fiat Chrysler Automobiles), among others.

Regarding quality issues, there have been some reports of defects in Carlex's windshield products. In 2015, there was a recall of approximately 17,000 vehicles due to potential defects in certain Carlex windshields. However, it's worth noting that recalls are not uncommon in the automotive industry, and Carlex has not been subject to any major or ongoing quality issues in recent years.

In terms of reputation, Carlex is generally well-regarded in the automotive glass industry for their high-quality products and strong customer service. They have received positive reviews from their customers, and their products are known for their durability and resistance to damage.

Overall, while there have been some quality issues in the past, Carlex is generally considered a reliable and reputable supplier of automotive glass products.
